mailSubject: Update on Missing Data Notification for J.P. MORGAN SECURITIES PLC
mailBody:
Dear Client,

I hope this message finds you well.

I wanted to provide you with an update regarding the missing and pending information identified in the checklist for J.P. MORGAN SECURITIES PLC (LEI ID: K6Q0W1PS1L1O4IQL9C32).

Here are the current statuses:

### Pending Information:
1. **Company Tax Documentation**: Some documents are verified; others are pending or require renewal.
2. **Company Regulatory Compliance**: Industry License and Environmental Compliance are under review.

### Missing Information:
1. **Company PEP Screening**: No data found for PEP screening.

### Validated Information:
- All other items in the checklist have been validated, including Company Directorship, which has been confirmed with active directors.

Please let us know if you require any further information or assistance regarding this matter. Your prompt attention to the pending items will help us ensure compliance and avoid any potential issues.

Thank you for your attention to this issue.

Best regards,
Surbhi Nagori
surbhi.nagori@capgemini.com
J.P. MORGAN SECURITIES PLC
